alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 6:53PM CST until February 03 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier Village Creek Near Kountze ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Louisiana... Sabine River Near Deweyville Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT TO LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Village Creek Near Kountze. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night to late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.4 feet, The water will be at the low chord of Highway 418. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Monday the stage was 14.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday morning to a crest of 18.0 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Village Creek Kountze 17.0 14.1 Mon 6 pm CST 16.2 17.8 17.8 &&
